author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place all of the ingredients into a small roasting dish, transfer to the oven and roast for 10-12 minutes. To serve, place onto serving plates.
ingredients: 10 vine tomatoes,  2 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tsp soft brown sugar
